name: PL-480 Market Development and Technical Assistance
objective: Uses available foreign currencies repaid to the United States to provide assistance in the implementation of market development and agricultural technical assistance activities.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: The program allows all segments of U.S. agriculture, including those associated with small-volume export commodities, to participate in efforts to build export markets. The overseas promotions focus on generic U.S. commodities, rather than individual brand-name products, and are targeted toward long-term market development.
